record.description: Old Town, house renovated by John and Janet Kahlert. Once a single family, fine house with hardwood floors and marble fireplaces. One floor was all white marble as well. All had been covered with linoleum or cheap board floors, now nothing and dark. Rear of the house.
record.source: Archival Photographic Files. Addenda. Mildred Mead Photographs
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
record.noteGeneral: Curling. Photographer stamp, handwritten date and caption.
